meanings.definition: A different form or version of something.
meanings.sent1: I prefer the chocolate variant of the ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The new variant of the game includes extra levels.
meanings.sent3: The variant of the story with the talking animals was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her variant of the painting added a unique twist to the original.
meanings.sent5: The rare variant of the flower bloomed in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Differing from others of the same kind or class.
meanings.sent1: The variant design of the dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: His variant approach to problem-solving yielded interesting results.
meanings.sent3: The variant color of the house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her variant hairstyle was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent5: The variant pattern on the fabric was truly unique.
